name: Generation Z
description:
A game about the dangers of overpopulation, and the inevitability of turning into a zombie.

Not only is the game about the instability of societies, the GAME ITSELF has been carefully crafted to be unbelievably unstable!

Controls: Hold right mouse button to turn, WASD to move, and left click to swing your stick. E to eat apples when near them. 

The aim is to get 100 immune humans (by them eating apples) before the zombies overrun you. Don't let the zombies get near the apples though, they will crush them, and they can only fall so fast.
